verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daivadaasulara meeru dheekshathoda rarandi Prabhu kreesthuni nija sevakulara{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nithyudagu kreesthu prabhuvu sathyasanghamunu gurchi Ichinatti darsanamandhu kattabadaga randi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Leveeyula paricharyala vivaramu nerigiyundi Sevakula paricharyanu valadhanu vaaru prabala{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kreesthuyesu rakthamichi konnatti sanghamandu Aposthululu adhikaramandhu prabhuvunu sevinchedamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devuni yedhuta yogyunigaanu siggupadanakkaraleni Panivaniga kanuparachukonanu jagartha padavalenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Irmiya, jherubhayelu yejra nehemyala Dheerathan joochi bheethini veedumu sthephanu poulula valenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vaadabarani mahima kireeta mivvanu vachuchunna Pradhana kapari rakada dhinamaye sradhatho mandhanu kayan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sangha darsanamondhina nijadhaiva dasulakai sahavasamandhu Nerpina satyamukai halleluah padedham{/lang-eng}
